website_summaries.verdict: The Sol Republic Punk manages to distinguish itself from the micro Bluetooth speaker competition with better battery life, slightly louder sound with minimal distortion, a water-resistant design and longer wireless range.
pros: The Sol Republic Punk is an attractively designed micro wireless speaker that's water- and shock-resistant and plays loud for its small size with minimal distortion
It also has decent battery life (8 hours) and offers extended wireless range (up to 60 feet)
cons: Its $70 list price is a little high

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this!
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this speaker. The sound quality and the price is really good, but you get what you pay for. This is my second one within 2-3 months and it's the same issue: the charging port is defective and the battery life is not what what's advertised. Do not purchase this unless you want to be annoyed with short batter life and a defective charging port. Unfortunately it's too late for me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jus10

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound coming from this little speaker BUT and here ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound coming from this little speaker BUT and here is the BUT! The battery life on these are horrible. Bought one around xmas and it worked great so I actually bought another one. Second one I bought holds no charge and now the first one I bought holds no charge. Again, awesome sound but don't buy if you want to take it with you as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Armfield

customer_reviews.title: This was used and holds no charge. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box it was obvious this was used. The cables were tied up but not in the little plastic bags. Mind you the plastic bag was in box. On the bottom of the device you could see visible signs of wear and tear(scratches). The kicker was I left in to charge for a few hours and went use it afterwards. Within 5 minutes of me unplugging it I got the battery low notice. It also smelled like someone who smoked cigarettes was obviously using it. I'm highly pissed off because nowhere in the description did it say this was used.
customer_reviews.author: KDog1800

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Battery
customer_reviews.text: Batteries are defective. Ive had 2 other ones and they both had battery issues. Sound quality is great for a micro speaker but the battery will fail.
customer_reviews.author: BNX21

customer_reviews.title: REFURBISHED ITEM?????
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and was disappointed that it wasn't boxed. Only came in plastic bag. I purchased one previously that was boxed. The description of this item did not say refurbished and am not very comfortable that it wasn't boxed with a picture of the item, therefore USED PREVIOUSLY???? I gave it a 3 star because this is a gift and am unsure of the quality if used or not. I don't have time to send back because of short notice invite so will still be giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tillie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it a year and the battery doesn't stay charged and there is a loud sound that last for a couple seconds coming from it when I'm watching a movie. I've barely used it so I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Micro USB port fails in 45 days
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate from micro USB connector failed after about 35 days of continuous use. If you can't charge it you can't use it. This is a basic design fault.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery.
customer_reviews.text: Battery crapped out quickly, I wouldn’t mind except it doesn’t even work when it’s plugged in now. Was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: but the audio battery life indicator is very annoying. When I am listening to music or a ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent little speaker, but the audio battery life indicator is very annoying. When I am listening to music or a show, I don't want it interrupted by the speaker saying "Battery half full". There should be a way to disable this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Gift what works better then most small single speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Have been a long time fan of SOL, & bought this as a gift. I own the red punk & the larger deck, & for the cheaper prices for these on Amazon, I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Br!anR

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.....
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing - I have only had it for a few months and have not really had a chance to use it - Now when I turn it on it says "Battery is Low" - This is after charging it all night. Hopefully I can return it. =(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 3 and a half stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 3 and a half stars if that were possible. The sound quality is OK, nothing special, but the unit is quite small, so I suppose that's to be expected. I haven't yet tried using it as a bluetooth receiver for my regular stereo, but if that works well, I think that use alone would more or less justify the cost of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jarret DiToro

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Dosent stay charged long mostly has to be plug in , had the same brand before and it had lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just died
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a year. Worked great, then died. Won't charge, don't have any idea how to fix it. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for the SOL. :)
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long. I had to constantly charge the speaker. One charge would give me about an 45 mins to an hour before it would beep signaling the battery would die soon. lasted about one year before it died completely.
customer_reviews.author: J. Inda

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Only thing is as mentioned previously the half full message comes on but that doesn't mean that the battery has reached half its capacity, it still plays for a good amount of time, past what the half way full message would imply. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $10
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The one I got sounded like a tin can. Maybe an issue with the unit, but it sounded as good ass a speaker for $10. Not worth the money in my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: LivyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged...
customer_reviews.text: when i got my SOL speaker, it had a tag from Kohls. And it did not sound as awesome as i expected it to be. I'm thinking a return probably. I fully charged it before turning it on and after 2 hours, get a "half full" warning. I thought it was 8 hours? I am just unlucky I got this repackage speaker I guess. Will return
customer_reviews.author: Amaz J

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: This device works very well. My only negative would be that if you turn up the volume the battery drains quickly. The sound quality and the connectivity works fantastic for such a small device. I would definitely recommend it to a friend. It definitely exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kowal

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. As expected. Good product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sounds great, voice it has is kinda annoying. It can't hold it's charge, but according to other reviews it just takes some time.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Sternstein

customer_reviews.title: The Punk Wireless has defective batteries. Poor quality item.
customer_reviews.text: DON'T purchase. I've received two now and BOTH were defective and did not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works way better than the earlier ones, holds battery life
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!
customer_reviews.text: I played with one of these at the beach!! I was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 1. Purchased the product last August and stopped working in December. Sent several email via their "Customer Service Request" to no avail. Do not buy...........
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I really loved the color and how small light weight and portable ...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the color and how small light weight and portable this speaker is. BUT...Already dead. Battery life is awful. Won’t hold charge anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage.  Do not waste your money to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Do not waste your money to buy. If you did, be careful. Plugged it into my computer to stream music and it short circuited the whole system. BEWARE! I'd give it less than a star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: X'mas gift for my daughter and she like it alot. Best park got it for 29.99 new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Boombox
customer_reviews.text: Very portable and the sound is incredible for something so small.
customer_reviews.author: scouseusa

customer_reviews.title: I was not expecting a little box like this to be very loud
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a little box like this to be very loud. I love the fact that it's bluetooth and easy to pair with both my android and apple devices. Always a great addition to picnics and gatherings
customer_reviews.author: Maple Tan

customer_reviews.title: Is very loud for such a small speaker and sounds extremely good.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. Is very loud for such a small speaker and sounds extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch, GREAT price point!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless speaker packs a solid punch. It is very loud for how small it is and yet mobile enough to put it in your back pocket. It can fill up 2 open, large rooms pretty easily. When the volume is all the way up, it looks 10% sound quality, but is not really noticeable. I am extremely satisfied with the product considering the price point is under $70 bucks!! There is no justification to buy the Bose or beats wireless speaker for over double/triple the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Big sound throughout the house. Great for backyard get togethers. Great range between device and speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but battery life not 8 hours more like 4
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Yvonne M Carroll

customer_reviews.title: for zumba they love it!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and her sisters use it to bake or cook in the kitchen, for zumba they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Walter A Perez

customer_reviews.title: Clear Sound in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: Great sound out of such a cute little fashionable speaker. I got it for my son, and I can't believe how clear the sound is or how much it helps the sound of his computer. He watches Netflix a lot in his laptop, and you had to sit right next to it to hear - with this speaker, you could sit all the way across the room only turned up half. Of course, he wants more colors now.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstein Howell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker it has a great sound .....
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Young

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: While it may be true that it seems as if this small speaker spends as much time charging as it does playing once it is charged, I love it's form factor. It's size, shape, ruggedness, and sound, for this price, make this bluetooth speaker a winner for me. I love throwing it into the pocket of a coat and bringing it out to listen to the abundance on my phone any time any place. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Chefdr

customer_reviews.title: Nice, does it jobs great
customer_reviews.text: Nice, does it jobs great. Only problem is that the speaker is always ON when (using it as a bluetooth receiver) is connected to a stereo
customer_reviews.author: Achille Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker if it would last more than 60 days. Will not charge now
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality. I bought this as a gift and he loved it! You can't go wrong with this speaker!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: If you want an awesome little bluetooth speaker for under 50
customer_reviews.text: If you want an awesome little bluetooth speaker for under 50.00(the blue was the cheapest one for some reason!) this is the way to go...it connects easier and faster than my Bose Soundlink which was like 300.00! This always finds its way back to connect too; the Bose doesn't ! The sound quality is great and it seems to have halfway decent battery life!!!! I don't understand why so many people have had an issue!
customer_reviews.author: LB Selix

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Audio Devices
customer_reviews.text: So awesome I had to have another! SOL is the top audio company for me. I get my high and low end frequencies! And these products are stylish better than Beats. Amazing customer service in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Dies very young!
customer_reviews.text: While it worked, it was GREAT. But it died less than a year from the time I purchased it. I know about built-in obsolescence, but this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: H. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it! (Not a great title, but bear with me...)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to use in her car because her stereo no longer works and she likes the music on her phone. It has great sound quality and I haven't heard any complaints from my mom after 7 months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hayward-Balash

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It's not a Bose in sound quality but it's small, light and has good sound. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: MangoMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but I'm still a loser.
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this and envisioned, I don't know, perhaps it would change my life. I would sit by the pool listening to Medeski Martin & Wood while being served cocktails by women clad in bikinis. This has not happened. It does what it says it does, and it's got a nice form factor and design, but my life is the same. Update! It died, granted it took a few years, but still. I reached out to the company just to ask about warranties, etc and they told me to pound sand. That's a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TS Jones

customer_reviews.title: Another bad one
customer_reviews.text: All of these are lemons. I will not return it because it's a hassle. I think when you buy something it should be exactly what what is described. If it is defective then sure return it. But this is a huge batch of bad speakers and there being sold. I think sol republic know this but simply will not deal with it. I want a new one sent to my door with out having to box it up and then worry if it's going to get lifted from my porch. No I'll keep it and tell everyone this whole batch is defective until I get sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Peck

customer_reviews.title: Price Quality good option.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has pros and cons. The max volume aint so loud, and it does not come with a wall charger just the USB cable. The battery lasts 8 hrs other speakers usually last 10 hrs. But the price, size, quality looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this small speaker with great sound. Perfect for carrying around for whenever you want to have music.
customer_reviews.author: J in NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an apartment
customer_reviews.text: Slice of heaven. Perfect for trips/showering/cooking/etc. It's durable, dropped it on hardwood floor & it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: harman

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't work well. I have returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work well. I have returned it twice (it was a gift for my father at Christmas) and it doesn't keep battery life. First charge & you have power for 6-8 hours. Anything after that you are lucky to get an hour or two out of it. :( Unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Jennnn

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what he wanted and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for Christmas. It is exactly what he wanted and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bartoli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little speaker. Great sound, quite loud! Easy to pair. Battery lasts at least 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sperling

customer_reviews.title: SOL Republic Punk defected product.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but a defected product. I had to return two of these speakers in the span of 3 weeks. Amazon is returning me my money will not waste my money again on the product. SOL Republic you are selling defected products. After 10 mins of listening, the speaker shuts off. Also, I keep getting the battery low message after 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Herminio

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great so far
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great so far. Item was not delivered as specified. MISSING HANDLEBAR MOUNT! So I'm very disappointed! Searched to get it for a good price, to put on my bike (motorcycle). Now I have no MOUNT which was the second reason I got it for, was the MOUNT option.............
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. I bought it as a birthday gift for my sister and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Morales

customer_reviews.title: Bad Battery Life - only at first
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and functionality of this speaker quite a bit, but the battery life kills it. They advertise 8 hour battery life. I listen at pretty high volume, so I don't actually expect 8 hours, but I'm getting about 1 hour and a half. That's unacceptable. Additionally, the battery seems to deplete even if the speaker is powered off. I listened until the speaker was at half battery strength and then turned it off. The next day, when I went to listen some more, the speaker was completely dead. Back it goes I guess. Edit: It started working acceptably after burn in.
customer_reviews.author: BarryM

customer_reviews.title: Fits all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Got Exactly as Expected, only thing i didnt expect was how big it was
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good, worth the money that I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRO GUTIERREZ

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality and range are very good. My issue starts with the directions which are ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and range are very good. My issue starts with the directions which are not very clear or informative. The other improvement would be making the controls more visible. Very hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: So I am happy at
customer_reviews.text: It not working proper anymore. So I am happy at all
customer_reviews.author: patty quezada

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC Punk Wireless Portable Bluetooth Speaker – Water & Sand Resistant, 60ft Range, Quick Bluetooth Pair, Ultra Portable, Aux In, Aux Out, Camera/Bike Mount, SOL-P1510BK Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBeware of Punk from Sol Republic. Smaller, tougher and louder than you would expect, the Punk Portable Bluetooth Wireless Speaker is the ultimate sidekick to make your music heard. Surprisingly loud for its size, Punk is fearless. Crank up the volume and fill your room with music or take the party outside. Water resistant, Punk can lounge poolside. Shock resistant, Punk is not afraid of ruthless backpacks. Even dust doesn't bother Punk, so mount it to your bike using the 1/4-inch threaded mount and head up to the mountains. Punk goes with you anywhere, all day with long-lasting 8-hour battery life. Super social, Punk lets you connect any non-Bluetooth audio devices using the 3.5mm cable. You can even connect to that old stereo using Punk as a Bluetooth hub. If you won't break the rules, Punk will.
feature_bullets: Delivers the powerful, fearless sound you need to make your music heard
Plays music wirelessly up to 60 feet away
Attach to bike or camera mount with the 1/4-inch threaded mount

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars209 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
